name: Hacker School Match
tagline: Find Hacker Schoolers with similar skillsets
body: ### Hacker School Match A bookmarklet to compare Hacker Schooler skill sets. Drag the link below to your bookmark bar and use the bookmarklet on the Hacker School private page. (Mozilla has [more information on how to install and use bookmarklets](https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/bookmarklets-perform-common-web-page-tasks), if you're unfamiliar.) A "find matches" link will appear underneath each person's photo. If there's no "find matches" link, that person has not listed any skills. Hacker School Match
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
